item.description:
Please join us for the launch of Keith O'Shaughnessy's first book, Incommunicado, winner of the first annual Grolier Discovery Prize. Following the reading, anyone who cares to join us may come along as we seek out a refuge for refreshments and discussion of our own recent writing.

You might also RSVP at http://www.facebook.c....
item.name: Book Launch for Incommunicado Winner of the First Grolier Discovery Prize
